original_text: that times of refreshing may come from the presence of the Lord, and that he may send the Christ appointed for you, Jesus,
korean_text: 또 주께서 너희를 위하여 예정하신 그리스도 곧 예수를 보내시리니

sentences.original_text: that times of refreshing may come from the presence of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 앞에서 상쾌함의 때가 오게 하려는 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and that he may send the Christ appointed for you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희를 위해 세우신 그리스도를 보내시려 함이며,
